text:
The Zilker Hayloft is very inviting and the location is wonderful. There are many excellent restaurants nearby and it is conveniently located. 

The decor and use of space is amazing and it's very comfortable. There are lots of windows which allow for natural lighting. The view of the bamboo trees surrounding the loft are amazing! The loft is very welcoming and clean. 

We had a wonderful stay and would strongly recommend this loft as your choice to stay.
title: Zilker Hayloft - Near Downtown
